titleWebDev: One code block at a time
textBE:
C#, ASP.Net Core: Enhance my expertise in C# and ASP.Net Core to develop secure, scalable, and reusable backend applications.
Azure: Deepen my knowledge and experience with cloud services to build robust cloud-native applications, leveraging services like Azure Functions, App Services, and Azure SQL Database.
textFE: React: Create highly responsive and reusable components to build interactive user interfaces. Vue.js: Explore the capabilities of Vue.js to understand its advantages and integrate it into projects where applicable.
textCMS: Umbraco: Expand my skills in Umbraco CMS to efficiently manage and deploy dynamic web content.
textAzure: Cloud Services: Leverage Azure's powerful capabilities in infrastructure management, application performance enhancement, and cloud-native development to build robust applications.
textGoal: The only obstacle is time, so strategic planning and focused efforts will be essential to achieve these goals.
